title: Hydro Flask is having an amazing sale on tumblers right now
text:
Hydro Flask is having an amazing sale on tumblers right now

Keep your drinks hot or cold for hours upon hours with a Hydro Flask tumbler. (Photo: Hydro Flask / Urban Outfitters)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Although fall is by far my favorite season, right now we're in that awkward time of the year when it's sweater weather in the morning but by the afternoon you're sweaty and at risk for heatstroke. We all want to be warm and cozy on our brisk morning walks to work, and cool off on our walks home, so what's the solution?

Well, with a Hydro Flask tumbler, you can keep your beverages ice cold or piping hot for hours on end—the only drawback being the high price tag (around $40 for their large size). The steep price shouldn't come as a shock though. Hydro Flask is one of the most popular brands out there for water bottles and tumblers, and have basically become a status symbol in recent months (shoutout, VSCO girls). They're not just a gimmick, however; Hydro Flasks are super durable, well-made, convenient to transport, and easy to drink from. And right now, they're offering a can't-miss discount on their tumblers.

If you enter the code TUMBLER-4Q8RG9 at checkout, you can take 50% off their 22 oz. and 32 oz. tumblers in the shades Black, Cobalt, Pacific, or Graphite. While these are selling out quickly in both sizes, you can also take 25% off their “retiring” colors, which include Mint in the 32 oz. size and Mint, Lava, and Flamingo in the 22 oz. size, no code needed. Personally I love using my tumbler at work to stay hydrated at my desk, keep my water from the bubbler cold, and sip on my coffee and tea throughout the day.

If you want to scoop up a water bottle too while you're at it, Hydro Flask also just discounted their limited-edition Shave Ice 32 oz. bottles for 25% off. They come in two ultra-cool gradient colors, plus you can score free shipping with the code BBFS1-92KJL. Sadly you can't use both promo codes for one order, but you'll get free shipping with orders over $60 anyways, so why not splurge a little?

The product experts at Reviewed have all your shopping needs covered. Follow Reviewed on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram for the latest deals, reviews, and more.

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
